subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brock Nelson and Travis Hamonic scored 1 minute 35 seconds apart in the first period in the Islanders’ 2-1 preseason victory over the Devils at Barclays Center.
snippet: Brock Nelson and Travis Hamonic scored 1 minute 35 seconds apart in the first period in the Islanders’ 2-1 preseason victory over the Devils at Barclays Center.
